card_text: When this card is activated: Banish 1 Ritual Monster from your Deck. You can send this card to the GY, then activate 1 of these effects;$N●Tribute 1 monster from your hand or field, or shuffle 1 Ritual Monster from your GY into the Deck, whose Level equals or exceeds the Level of the monster banished by this card's effect, then Ritual Summon that monster.$N●Add the monster banished by this card's effect to your hand.$NYou can only use 1 "Renewal of the World" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
